esri-inc.name: Esri
esri-inc.html:
Esri (Environmental Systems Research Institute) is a software company best known for its ArcGIS products, and it is the largest leading supplier of Geographic Information System (GIS) software.

Esri donates $1B in software to K-12 (from kindergarten to 12th grade) and have built a community of GeoMentors to inspire a new generation and help the understand an love geography. It is also been used in many leading colleges and universities prepare students for meaningful careers, to understand the Earth's natural systems and human cultures and thus be able to innovate and help creating a more sustainable world .
